content: ककुद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A summit, peak. {@--2@} Chief, head; see ककुद below. {@--3@} The hump on the shoulders of the Indian bull. {@--4@} A horn. {@--5@} An ensign or symbol of royalty (as the छत्र, चामर &c.). {@--6@} Any projecting corner. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a daughter of Dakṣa and wife of Dharma. (According to Pāṇini <ls>V. 4. 146-147</ls> ककुद् is the form to be substituted for ककुद in adj. or <ab>Bah.</ab> comps.; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} त्रिककुद्).
